titles: An humble desired union betweene prerogative and priviledge shewing, that if one draw too hard one way, and the other another, the whole common-wealth must be in danger to be pull'd in sunder.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Charles I, 1625-1649 --  Sources.
